page.title: 14RELIGION & PEOPLE:WOKINGHAM
page.content:
Property owned includes the {Vicarage, the Parish Room, and Palmer {Lodge}left by a former churchwarden for church use now occupied by the {verger}at a nominal rent taking into account his duties as caretaker, sacristan and maintenance man.
{Christian Stewardship,}the rightful use of time, talent and money, is responsible for features such as the neat churchyard, handwoven kneelers and portable font, and church-linked organisations like{Brownies, Guides, {Scouts, Cubs, Youth Fellowship,}and a thriving{Sunday School; Toddler {services}too. Parish News Magazine appears monthly. Money given is about Â£1.60 weekly per person on average but voluntary service is valued.
